mapper.select: select team_id, team_desc, team_icon, team_name, team_slogen, team_state, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, deleted, version, team_city from team01.javaee_team where team_id = #{teamId}

select team_id, team_desc, team_icon, team_name, team_slogen, team_state, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, deleted, version, team_city from team01.javaee_team limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into team01.javaee_team(team_desc, team_icon, team_name, team_slogen, team_state, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, deleted, version, team_city) values (#{teamDesc}, #{teamIcon}, #{teamName}, #{teamSlogen}, #{teamState}, #{createTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUser}, #{deleted}, #{version}, #{teamCity})
mapper.update:
update team01.javaee_team
team_desc = #{teamDesc},
team_icon = #{teamIcon},
team_name = #{teamName},
team_slogen = #{teamSlogen},
team_state = #{teamState},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_user = #{createUser},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_user = #{updateUser},
deleted = #{deleted},
version = #{version},
team_city = #{teamCity},
where team_id = #{teamId}
